I have the app on my iPhone , so I can check up on her .. While visiting a friend , I noticed she wasn't in the living room ..  I rushed home , and discovered she was stuck in the bathroom ..  I'm now buying a few more of them , to cover my entire house ..

Reviews.Title: Exceeded my expectations
Reviews.Author: Connie Schenk "Connie Schenk, PhD"
Reviews.Content: I have looked at many cameras and their output and the reported complexity of installation and was suspicion that this couldn't possibly be as good as advertised. Well I was very wrong!  This is the most awesome camera I have ever seen! Installed in less than 5 minutes, including downloading the app for my husband and my smart phones and my computer. Color is representative, angle superb, audio quality is unbelievably excellent. I just got back from shopping and noticed I had a couple of alerts for "sound activity" so when I checked and then listened to that moment of sound detection I had to start laughing - it was a bird outside the sliding glass doors! This is worth every penny of what I paid and I am planning on getting more due to the quality and ease of installation. I would recommend this over any of the other cameras I have been researching. 5 star rating for sure!!!

Reviews.Title: Amazing Device!!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Cajigas
Reviews.Content: The Dropcam Pro has been a lifesaver for me since my husband is very ill and my daughter who lives out-of-state can now view how he's being taken care of with the home care we hired.  I recommend this camera with the highest recommendation!

Reviews.Title: Easy to set up and great quality
Reviews.Author: Patrick Maggitti
Reviews.Content: Very impressed with simplicity of set up as well as picture and sound quality. I highly recommend but given the subscription fee required, if you want to be able to review past events....real time is free, I wish the upfront cost were about half.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Richard Magee
Reviews.Content: A great HD security camera with a nice clear wide angle view.  Very easy to set up.  Price was a little high, but the quality is worth the money.  I tried other cameras and this camera is by far the best.

Reviews.Title: Bought just in time
Reviews.Author: Jason J
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is great day or night. Setup took about a minute. I wish I could get the infrared to work through a window but the picture is usually clear enough at night without it. Had the cam up for about a week and caught a robbery in progress.http://youtu.be/iooyLQgRYu0Finding activity on the cam is easy because all movement gets a little colored stripe on the timeline so you don't have to wade through hours of footage to see if you caught something. The first time I had even looked at how to make a clip was to hand over evidence to the police but even then it only took a minute. Also the whole thing is small and light enough to stick to my window with 3M tape. My only gripe is the monthly fee but the thing works so well I can't really complain.

Reviews.Title: Super easy set up!!
Reviews.Author: Denise C
Reviews.Content: Great camera quality! Super easy to set up. Love that it syncs to my iPhone and comes on and off as I come and go from home. I am using it to keep an eye on my elderly mother who lives with me.

Reviews.Title: good quality
Reviews.Author: LOGIC Srl
Reviews.Content: Quality is very good for a non expensive camera.Two way talk is not easy due to 5-to-10 seconds delay.

Reviews.Title: Mystery Solved!
Reviews.Author: Sign Shop
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to see which one of the three dogs have been relieving themselves in our den.  I quickly learned that there are two that make up the guilty duo.  If you are considering between the standard and the pro, I would recommend the pro.  The night vision works great and the fact that you can speak through the camera is a major plus.  Access from my iPhone and iPad make this a real winner.  It did make me upgrade my eight year old wireless router, as my old one was going in and out.  Set up was also a breeze....  Great product and I would highly recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Easy, Quick, and Wonderful
Reviews.Author: T. Luciani
Reviews.Content: I have purchased probably 4 or 5 different "video monitoring cameras".  In each case, I have been sincerely disappointed.  The technology has just never worked right.  Whether it was x10, Logitech or newer technologies like Piper - in each case there are issues and difficulties.  Cameras are difficult to setup or the camera is setup and it loses its connection... you can only use the camera in the house and the minute you go outside the camera never connects.  Whatever the case may be, you encounter issue after issue and it is annoying, costly and frustrating.A friend mentioned to me the dropcam and told me how easy it would be to use.  I doubted it but I took a shot.  Literally from start to finish, setup took me under 1 minute.  I have connected from my iPhone and multiple computers - everything works perfectly.  It is very fast and simple.  The technology is brilliant and simple.  I am extremely happy with everything about the camera and even purchased a second for the house.  Kudos to drop cam - nice work by a great company.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding camera
Reviews.Author: Bruce D. Verfaillie
Reviews.Content: Great camera --great company--extremely easy to set up. This company will only get better as these cameras become more popular.There has been a lot of requests for Dropcam to make an outside unit. The camera is attractive and does a decent job both day andnight. It is very easy to log into when you're away from home. The monthly fee is reasonable and there is a choice of subscriptions,although you do not a subscription in order to use the camera and view from anywhere in the world.Very smart idea and design.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Melvey "Rick F"
Reviews.Content: Exceptiona video quality. Works extremely well. Highly recommend. I have the lower resolution HD camera also, and this Pro version has a much better video quality.

Reviews.Title: Recommended
Reviews.Author: W. Veidt
Reviews.Content: very impressed with  the overall performance of the camera.  excellent coverage and detail available both in daylight and night modes.  provides peace of mind.

Reviews.Title: This is a winner!
Reviews.Author: Chris Lissner
Reviews.Content: This was exactly what I was looking for, a way to monitor my house without having to involve the security company.Strengths:1) easy to set up2) I had to call the company initially, they were very helpful and very responsive3) works as advertised both online and on your smart phone or iPadAreas to improve:1) these devices use a lot of bandwidth, so before you install multiple devices in your home or business make sure you have a big enough pipe to accommodate them.2) these devices continually record both video and sound (if the sound is turned on). It would be nice if the device simply recorded when it was triggered rather than continually use up the bandwidth. We have another camera system through Alarm.com, it records something like 30 seconds before an activity is triggered and then the activity and then stops.3) I am subscribed to the seven day service, and have noticed that it times when I'm going to replay events that it hangs up as it accesses the history from their server. If I try again at a later time it will play. Given their recent growth, I question their network capacity.Despite the areas for improvement, this is a solid camera system and I'm very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: EqMama
Reviews.Content: we have this model as well as the original model, and this one outperforms the other one in every way.  picture is clear even at night, and works well as a baby monitor.  the original model is basically useless at night, very blurry and cant tell what you're even looking at.  NOT useful at all as a baby monitor.  i wish i had two of this pro model instead.

Reviews.Title: Great Imaging; Fantastic Service
Reviews.Author: Richard G. Smith MD
Reviews.Content: Have purchased three Pros for home security.  Fairly easy to set up.  I occasionally lose a connection for a period of time; unable to determine why.  The quality of the imaging is great; zoom is good (optical) based on enhancing defined area of image to high definition.One of the cameras went bad after a few months; I called customer service and got a response without any hassles.  The replacement was sent expedited delivery  before the defective unit was sent.Having gone through endless aggravation with other companies' customer service (not to mention Toshiba by name!) this was a welcome surprise.  The experience almost made me pleased that one of the cameras failed.Would highly recommend the product and the company.(lost one star for the product failure)

Reviews.Title: I would highly recommend
Reviews.Author: angelo gallo
Reviews.Content: Great product works flawlessly. Have had other cameras this one by far surpasses them. Exceeded my expectations setup was quick and easy

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Candace Pekich
Reviews.Content: We have tried everything to keep a Peeping Tom away from our bedroom windows. If he's not peeking in, he's shining a bright flashlight at us all night long. The police have tried and failed to catch him for 4 years now. The wide viewing angle is fantastic and so far it's keeping him much farther away. We know he's still there because we see his flashlight occasionally, but he is no longer disturbing our sleep. We also love the Cloud Recording which allows us to look back and mark events just in case this guy is dumb enough to make an appearance! Thanks, Dropcam, for a really great product!  As soon as you invent an outdoor version, we'll be on it!

Reviews.Title: Dropcam Pro
Reviews.Author: Margaret M. McElroy
Reviews.Content: I love the Dropcam product!  I use it to show my puppies so that their new families can enjoy them every second of their lives.  Since the Dropcam works at night a well as during the day, they can so so.  It is SUPER easy to set up - takes less than 5 minutes, and you do not need to be an expert to do it.  It is mobile, small, and easily placed.  The video stream can be Public, or private - or just shared with specific people that you send the link to.  The audio can be turned off.  You can set up a schedule for it to be on or off - with just a few clicks in a menu.  The Dropcam Pro has a wider picture are and a larger zoom.  Customer service is friendly, competent, easily reached - and human!!!I highly recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!
Reviews.Author: Barbara R
Reviews.Content: Just purchased one to try it out and it's awesome! We mounted it under the kitchen cabinet, so when we don't want it in use we just fold it up and it's concealed behind the cabinet molding.  The lens has a wide range and camera can reach from one side of the room to the other with no problem.  We easily downloaded the Dropcam app on our iphones and ipad, so it's just a click away to view.  There's also a microphone, but we haven't tried that yet.We purchased Uniden camera set from Costco and use it in another home, but that's going back.  This is so easy, lightweight and not an eyesore in the room.  We are going to purchase more for both homes.  I highly recommend.  Great price for great product.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam is great - better than I imagined
Reviews.Author: RFTEJerry
Reviews.Content: I bought my first Dropcam Pro because I got tired of rushing home to a call from my alarm company that turn out to be false. It arrive when they promised. It took less than 5 minutes to set up. Two days later, I got a call that my alarm has gone off. I log into my Dropcam and saw my dog walking around. No open doors. My TV still in place. Right after that I bought my second Dropcam Pro. Now with these two I can see all three entrances to my house plus the entry into my back bedroom and hallway. All the places a thief has to go to get around my house - so he is caught! I also have the 7 day CRV plan on both cameras. This is great too. You can tag recurring motion picked up (like my dog) so an alert will come in as "dog motion" and you can ignore it. I can turn the cameras on/off via my smart phone. The camera are relatively small and don't draw attention to them. I have had several guests over and they didn't notice then up on the walls until I told them I had them. I highly recommend Dropcam to anyone who is looking for video monitoring.

Reviews.Title: Excellent video monitoring camera.
Reviews.Author: J A Banker
Reviews.Content: I love it. Easy to install and use. I really like the ability to zoom in on an area without losing to much clarity.

Reviews.Title: Great Video Quality and Connection Reliability
Reviews.Author: CS LB
Reviews.Content: The quality and reliability of the video, the website, and mobile app is outstanding. However, I am rating it 4, since the optional* monthly cost is exorbitant, particularly since it applies to every camera one owns--even though extra cameras get a 50% discount on the service fees.* I called it optional, as it is not required to be able to view live video feeds. But without the monthly service, one cannot even access a 5-second clip of video during sound/motion alerts. This means that without the service, one gets alerts with not much context of what was happening that caused the alert.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Darrell M.
Reviews.Content: Works great. Easy hookup. I have a slow internet connection also. But have to pay for icloud so you can go back in time to look at dropcam.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam Pro exceeds expectations
Reviews.Author: Rob Reider
Reviews.Content: I've put off purchasing a Dropcam for a couple of years and I'm glad I waited for the "Pro." Within 3 weeks of getting it, I was on the road and got a call from my alarm company that the alarm had gone off and that the kitchen door had been compromised. I was worried but asked the alarm company rep to stand by while I checked the Dropcam that was aimed in such a way that I could see the door in question. When I looked at the image and saw that it was still closed I told the rep that everything was OK and the door sensor must have gone bad. Since I was going to be on the road for another 5 days I was very relieved about knowing that my house hadn't had a break-in. Thanks to the Dropcam Pro, my mind was set at ease.Video resolution is very good and the zoom and enhancement capabilities are pretty amazing. It was very easy to set up and has been solid as a rock in my network. I'm considering getting another to have in my home office.Very good piece of equipment and I recommend it highly. It's worth every penny!!

Reviews.Title: WORKS VERY WELL
Reviews.Author: ronny111 "ron"
Reviews.Content: It works very well and wifi setup was a breeze. However, I had to change my security from WEP to WPA. WEP simply would not work.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Publius
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised!  Only drawback is sensors will alert you of sudden changes in lighting such as a light coming on with a timer.  Set up could not be easier and it works right out of the box!

Reviews.Title: good camera, but BEWARE of some things
Reviews.Author: c.mac
Reviews.Content: You must make sure you have a GOOD, solid internet connection and enough bandwidth. I believe the minimum per camera is 0.5 mbps. and if you have 2 Dropcams, it's 1 mbps and so forth. But also keep in mind that if you have a computer, laptop, TV, cell phone that is using the WiFi in your home as well, that it will consume and share this bandwidth with the Dropcam.I say this because my Dropcam tends to lose connection here and there and it's because of the bandwidth. and yes, my router is in the same room and close to my camera. So please make note of your internet connection before buying. it will start to alert you though when your camera has low signal. The bandwidth will also affect your live viewing. The connection will not be able to keep up and you will start to see bits of the clips lagging. It can be frustrating when trying to watch the live feed.Overall, the quality of the physical components of the camera are great. (It also comes with a wall mount). There is a blue light that stays on when recording and if your camera loses signal, it will blink yellow (as it is trying to find wifi connection). There is a red blinking light and believe that it when it detects motion. The light though is subtle and not obnoxious to where it alarms intruders or anyone else that you have a camera.If you are set up for motion alerts, it has the ability to send you an email with a screencap of the detected motion. Although the timing kind of lags in the photo, I will usually get blank shots of my room once I've walked passed it. I've encountered a couple of times where it has been able to capture a person in the screengrab.The actually quality of the video itself is okay (not as superior as you would think). You can see some examples of the quality online at Dropcam's main website, where they have public live feeds. But I will admit, the quality is better than most cameras I've encountered. The night vision capabilities are great! So if anything happens at night, you are able to clearly see what's going on. I love the talk feature- it is crisp, clear, and loud (if need to be) when I speak into the mic from my phone, but the two way talk feature doesn't really work. So I can never really hear the other person unless if I shut off the mic. This might be due to the low bandwidth as well.Other than that, setup is super easy. Just plug it into the computer and set up the wifi connection, then plug it into the wall where you want it set up.

Reviews.Title: Fun piece for peace of mind.
Reviews.Author: E
Reviews.Content: Still learning how to use this camera fine for now pretty happy with it. The one thing that is driving me nuts is, it has a hard time reaching my wifi which isn't far at all.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam review
Reviews.Author: Dean Werner
Reviews.Content: Very easy setup.  App on android and ipad works well.  Clarity, night mode and field of vision is adequate.  Overall a very well designed product.

Reviews.Title: A locked down cam with optional fee's but easier to use and better security from hackers than other options
Reviews.Author: Spork
Reviews.Content: Tis true that Dropcam is locked to their service. If you want to record you have to pay the cvr fee. However I am glad that it does not work like a conventional IP cam because they have atrocious security. It doesn't matter if you change the default ports and user id. Most of the competitors do not use a encrypted connection and are open to attack. Some have upnp turned on by default and will happily give the entire internet a window into your home. Some higher end cams do offer ssl at least for the login info but I'm still not sure if the actual video feed is encrypted. Even the popular Blue Iris software only recently added digest authentication which still isn't ssl.Eventually I would like to see the option to use third party software but the dropcam is secure and the apps are solid. For a comparison I was using the commercial software xprotect with a Hikvision DS-2CD2432F-IW. It was more like viewing snapshots than live viewing remotely and no audio support with that combo. Dropcam has it down to a science when optimizing your connection for remote viewing. While the always uploading can be a con for some it works out because multiple family members can view the same feed without draining your home connection.  If you want to record and view locally only then this isn't for you. I also want to mention that the hardware, software, electricity , and your maintenance time for local recording are far from free and underestimated by most people.As for some con's. The mobile app is missing a basic option that everyone else has. A screenshot button. While I'm ok with dropcam being locked to their service it needs more variety in cvr plans. I would like to see something for 1 - 3 days of recording even if it was only 20 bucks cheaper per year. If they ever break the minimum price point of $99 per year for service I would look else where.Over all I would say that IMHO the dropcam is probably the best option at the moment if you want something remotely accessible.

Reviews.Title: Did not disappoint
Reviews.Author: PJ
Reviews.Content: Moved to a new apartment. This side of town wasn't sketchy but I knew management had spare keys and maintenance had access to those spare keys so I wanted to be assured that no one would be coming in without my notice.Camera quality is great, sound is just as good. Definitely would like to see in the future of an integration of their cloud recordings so I wouldn't have to buy separate cloud recording services for each dropcam!

Reviews.Title: Great Cam For Your Kids
Reviews.Author: Peter Guirguis
Reviews.Content: I bought this WebCam originally to put it in my daughter's room so that we can make sure that she is safe since she's only two years old. I was surprised at how well it operated and the set up was so easy. I was able to get it up and running flawlessly in about a minute and a half.It shoots quite well in the dark so we can see what our two-year-old is doing when she is trying to go to sleep at night. My wife is pregnant with our second child and I'm planning on buying another one for our new baby.

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: Dominique Laborde
Reviews.Content: very good product, very easy to set-up and very good resolution. One would wish however that Dropcam would send text alerts instead of emails (but maybe I haven't figured it out yet...)

Reviews.Title: Tried for the first time
Reviews.Author: suz
Reviews.Content: I did not own the previous version, or any other device like this, so I can't do a comparison. Picture seems good. There is a two second delay. I haven't tried the sound yet.There were a couple hiccups with the set up, but I called customer service and it worked out.If they were cheaper I would buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Norb
Reviews.Content: Very easy to set up and very easy to use. I use it everyday to check in on our cats. I also like having it recording to the cloud so if something ever happens in my house i will be able to watch it and record it. Over all we love this drop cam. Very Cool!

Reviews.Title: Not worth the investment
Reviews.Author: KBG1978 "K"
Reviews.Content: I'll try and keep it simple... The quality of the images is just O.K.; it may be better than a lot of what's out there but that shouldn't lead you to believe that you'll be satisfied with the video feed.  The image looks pretty good when you first log in, but any zooming at all immediately pixelates the image to near-uselessness.  We have a stellar network speed and top of the line airport base station; there's no shortcoming on that front.Where this camera really shines is its ease of setup, automatic updating, and accessibility from a lot of devices.  I found the motion and sound alerts to be prompt and useful.  The app is easy to use and free.  It also does a great job detecting sound and motion, but you're access to these features is really hampered by the cost of subscribing to their CVR (continuous video recording) service.  In my opinion, the absence of a memory card slot is not an oversight by Dropcam, its a business decision aimed at inducing you to subscribe to a costly service.The bottom line: If you absolutely need to buy a camera, this might be the best of what's out there right now.  With that being said, if you can wait, I certainly would.  I returned both cameras I had purchased and will revisit the next permutation by Dropcam or perhaps whatever new devices this product spurs among the competition.

Reviews.Title: Totally worth it!
Reviews.Author: Trina3x3
Reviews.Content: If you're thinking about getting this, get it!!  It is wondeful! Super easy set up; great customer service! Excellent product!!

Reviews.Title: This webcam is the Best!
Reviews.Author: Karl
Reviews.Content: Much better connectivity and video/audio quality than the previous model. Updates itself. Rock solid operation. Love its dependability. This webcam is the Best!

Reviews.Title: Simple set up.  Works just as described.
Reviews.Author: Kathy Morris
Reviews.Content: Reliable, immediately contacts owner if motion, or sound is detected.  May purchase another camera, out performs mole camera which is what we owned previously

Reviews.Title: Perfect nanny cam
Reviews.Author: Ms Stacey Crockett
Reviews.Content: We are using this as a nanny cam and its perfect. Great picture quality, speaker is good, and the 9.99 a month monitoring is great price.

Reviews.Title: Great product and app
Reviews.Author: coop
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this item and it works great. It works from any distance and has really good video quality. It's a little expensive but i think it is worth it completely.

Reviews.Title: super easy
Reviews.Author: Techie1234
Reviews.Content: super easy to set up and use - took all of about 3 minutes from the time I opened the box to the time I was able to start viewing the video on line - image quality is amazing (day and night). my only complaint about this device is not in the hardware but in that the company charges waaaay too much for the online recording ($100/yr for 7 days worth, $300/yr for 30 days --- for EACH camera --- that is ridiculous). Fortunately, I'm only interested in live view and no recording.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: m. onstad
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! It was super easy to set up. The picture is clear. I work nights and have a teenage daughter so I use it from work to check up on her and the house. Has really helped my stress level not having to worry if she came home from her friends house. Did she come home on time? I just check the footage and then I don't have to worry. I can actually watch her come in the house. See what she does when she comes home. Kinda makes me feel like I'm there a little bit. Also has been interesting to see what the cats and dogs do while we're sleeping.

Reviews.Title: Best Camera
Reviews.Author: dasincorp
Reviews.Content: This is the third wifi camera I purchased.  The other types are good and work but the Dropcam is much clearer.  The video is excellent and the two way audio works fine.

Reviews.Title: Safety
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: This product is really great. I'm so glad I got it. I have already recommended it to several friends. The apps are really great.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Product in All Aspects
Reviews.Author: Spiro C. Manolis
Reviews.Content: This is an outstanding camera. The wide angle and night vision are the most useful aspects for my needs and this camera is right on target. The video is clear and the two way audio an added feature. I was impressed with the thoughtfulness and quality of the installation instructions - minimal but exactly what needed for easy installation. Installation is a no brainer and also very quick. I installed this camera over a month ago and it has been working flawlessly since then. I use this camera for security and the recording of video on the vendors cloud is what I needed. I have other cameras that record locally but I had to purchase cloud storage to store the video because locally stored video can easily disappear with the camera. This product exceeded my expectation and it gets an unconditional five star rating and recommendation.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: This product is great. Easy setup and awesome quality. Also has a great app for apple. Would definitely recommend to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Great Clarity, Motion Detection Insufficiently Adjustable
Reviews.Author: Shelby Dunn
Reviews.Content: There is no question that this is a great cam and a super service; at least for my purposes.  The cam and system has two major shortcomings: (1) there is no weatherproof method to do an outdoor mounting.  Some home made fixes are available on the Dropcam web site, but they are also difficult to accomplish and really do not do the job anyway.  (2) the motion sensitivity needs to have a range adjustment.  Every leaf, minor tree movement from light winds, etc., generates an email.  All the "false alarms" diminish the cam's usefulness as an alert mechanism.  The cam would work best to monitor indoor spaces (like a home) where there should be no motion when people are not at home, but then the cam would have to be deactivated/unplugged when occupied or a flurry of emails would ensue.  For 20% of the cost of a multi-cam system, I can put up with some of this.  However, with these severe limitations of the Dropcam and advancing technologies, Dropcam had better improve to cover these bases -- and do so quickly.

Reviews.Title: Love it in spite of a few issues - can only improve
Reviews.Author: JPC
Reviews.Content: Got 2 pro within a week - so enthusiastic about the first that I had to get another one. Easy installation, easy access through computer, iphone or iPad even through cellular data. Night vision fantastic - use it to discover what our newly adopted cat does during the night. Can be move and plugged elsewhere in the house, get reconnected fast. One issue with the second one where the power supply might be defective and would have to return and get a new one if confirmed. Love the ability to create clips and download locally. A few seconds delay between real time and video, but expected. Lots of fun talking to family members or control the dogs through the microphone. Fast forward/reward would be a great addition. A well finished product with still some areas for improvement. Would like to be sure that their site will NEVER be hacked as it is quite personal information.UPDATE: received an email offering a free replacement for the power supply within 10 minutes of sending them a request through their website. This is excellence in customer service - and I am not affiliated with Dropcam. Impressive.

Reviews.Title: I have to give it five stars!
Reviews.Author: five times the cat
Reviews.Content: I love my Dropcam Pro camera.I had been researching security cameras for quite awhile.If you have done the research too, you know that no one camera is the "perfect" solution.The Dropcam Pro is pretty close to perfect for my situation.Heres some great things about this camera :* Setup was super easy.It can even be set up with an ipod touch (5th gen) or iphone.* There are apps for iso or Android viewing.I watch mine on my ipod touch and my kindle fire HDX. You can do live viewing or look at your activity feed from the apps.You can change your cameras setting from the apps.You CANNOT make clips,view saved clips or download saved clips from either app.You will need a pc or laptop to make clips,view saved clips or download saved clips.* I love the versatility of this camera.I can move it anywhere within my home as my needs change.I can use it to look out my various windows.I can watch my pets if I desire.* I love the cloud recording options.I am not tech savy enough,rich enough and I don't have the time to set up my own recording system.I chose the 7 day 9.99 option.I mistakenly thought I had to pre pay for a year.I can afford 10.00 bucks a month and I can cancel or upgrade at anytime.Plus I love that the recording is held off site.If someone steals my camera they can't steal the video!* I have cable wifi so my connection is pretty quick.I have had zero connection issues.* I often use this camera at night through a glass paned window.I shut off the cameras night time light.The area I am recording (my front porch and lawn) is well lit.The camera captures the area very well.I have also moved this camera to a bathroom window and pointed through a hole I made in the screen (on a dry night)I wanted to watch my car which was parked on a street about 50 feet away. Again the camera night time light was turned off and the area is also well lit.I can see the car very well.I would not be able to make out the face of someone bothering my car but I can see if anyone goes near it.* I called their customer service hotline with a question about making clips.Their rep answered the phone quickly,was friendly and very informative.Overall,I am so happy with this camera and the recording options. Its everything that I was hoping it would be.When I save up for a bit I am going to get a second camera.I highly recommend this camera to a person/family seeking a security camera.

Reviews.Title: Set up was a breeze
Reviews.Author: Gerardo Marenco
Reviews.Content: We opted for this camera system after looking for alternatives to the traditional alarm system. Our experiences with a traditional alarm system were dismal between forgetting to turn it on or triggering false alarms. With this system we have a hands on approach to security that filters through whats happening with their great array of mobile apps and web application. After seeing what the "cloud" service afforded us we were immeadiatly swayed to pay for the service. Most convenient is the ability to begin the motion alert system once you leave the house with your iPhone, and turning off the alert system once the iPhone is detected back "home". We couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: Effective monitoring using cost efficient cameras
Reviews.Author: a NY-Staten Islander
Reviews.Content: I started by using one camera indoor to see the quality and reliability of this camera for three months. Quality was effective- clear picture quality, wide angle coverage, clear night vision, etc. etc. Whereas, the reliability is dependent on the bandwidth signal of Wi-Fi. Even though the camera might be working but if the Wi-Fi is slow the camera stops working. After using it for six months, I have now purchased two additional cameras for my house and two cameras for my parents house so that they can monitor their house as well. Overall, I recommend this product.I hope Dropcam is working on the outdoor camera as well!

Reviews.Title: Extremely high quality and you can hear and talk into it.
Reviews.Author: Aaron H. Shiu "Airon"
Reviews.Content: Dropcam is so EZ to setup!  This security camera is sick!  I really like it.  I just HATE that they dont give you enough rewind on the previous hours or days.  Just the moment when you need to see.  ZERO recording.  They need more competition!  Hopefully someone will copy them and make the cloud recording more free then it is!  The dropcam I would say is banking millions easily!  More people should get into this business!..HAhaoO yeah 30 days free on cloud recording then you pay a arm and a leg for cloud recordings!  But it does give you moment notice when camera picks up noise or motion to your mobile.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Remote Camera
Reviews.Author: DanC
Reviews.Content: The picture is very sharp and clear. I like the zoom feature in which you zoom in on part of the original view, then enhance the image so it looks almost as good as the full  view.  As many other reviewers have mentioned the two way sound is not that great; However, I did not buy it for the sound.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam Pro is certainly what I expected
Reviews.Author: Delphis Vera
Reviews.Content: Great product and works as advertised. I was looking for a camera for home security that can be integrated to mobile technologies. I did some research and finally came up with the high rated Dropcam Pro. Even though it seems to be quite expensive, it's worth the buy. Great video resolution, impressive field of view, and easy-to-use mobile application.The first unit I bought had a problem with the night vision feature; however, customer support handled it perfectly and sent me another unit. I was really impressed with the customer service. I only wish they can extend their client support for international customers. Overall, I feel very confident that this camera will last a good amount of time due to its solid materials and a well-done design. Good job Dropcam Team.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Justin Bailey
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical of this at first just because of how simple it was. Too much very relieved surprise, this product went above and beyond. For anyone that says the video quality is just "ok", must have too many 3D TVs in their house because the quality is astounding. There is a slight curve to the image but nothing at all that is so noticeable that you won't get used to it. Night vision is excellent. Did not buy the yearly subscription so I cannot comment on the 30-day play back, but the Zoom-Wand works great so if you need to zoom in on something, you hit the wand and quality goes back to nearly as good as zoomed all the way out. Sound quality is pretty clear as well. I had to turn off the alerts because it alerted my phone almost EVERYTIME our baby's balloon on his crib moved but that can be said as a good thing in that the motion detection on it is great if you have a sleeping baby and want to know when they wake up. I also love the fact that you can set an on-and-off timer on the camera so that for those stretches of time when, say, your baby is at daycare, it automatically turns off from whatever time and day you set it to when you need it. Very handy. All in all, if I could give the product 10 stars I would, and I absolutely recommend it to anyone who is in the market for a small, maybe the size of an average mans hand from middle finger to bottom of the palm, wifi camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product, Great Customer Support
Reviews.Author: Jason Edge
Reviews.Content: I have installed 2 cameras, and initially had some technical issues using Internet Explorer 11.  I contacted Dropcam support and unlike almost all other tech help out there, they made sure the issues were quickly resolved.  I'll add that the $150 per year for 2 cameras with the 7 day rolling video recording to the cloud, is very reasonable and a great for offsite monitoring and security. We have one pointed out over our main drive way and use it for everything from monitoring when the mail is delivered and home deliveries, to knowing when others are at home or away.  Me and my wife access the cameras from our iphones, work PCs, and home PC's and it really is a cool product!  Both the camera and cloud recording service are both great and highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Security
Reviews.Author: Larry Womack
Reviews.Content: I think they are great.  I leave my house for a couple weeks at a time.Now with Dropcam, I feel very comfortable being gone!

Reviews.Title: a great addition to my security system
Reviews.Author: William H. White
Reviews.Content: Excellent cameras, easy connect to wifi and seems to be reliable. Great job. After I had hooked up one and used it, I ordered anther for my vacation home..... Great job dropcam!

Reviews.Title: Think about your needs
Reviews.Author: W. Poole
Reviews.Content: I love this camera although it has it's problems, they told me that the occasional disconnect is from maybe being to far from my wireless router and that I should move it to a different area to see if that is the problem. I don't see where the distance should be a factor and if it is then the camera is not worth the money. I was considering purchasing another but have since decided not. Another thing is there is no local storage and you are tied into buying monthly storage on the cloud. again not worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Great but beware if outside of the US / Canada
Reviews.Author: CheekyChappie
Reviews.Content: The camera itself is brilliant, I cannot fault it.  The set up is lightning quick thanks to the bluetooth process, the tracking and sensitivity is good and night vision superb.  I have purchased this primarily as a baby monitor and it wont let me down.The current caveat is that if you purchase outside of the US / Canada, you will not be able to purchase the CVR function (it comes with two weeks free).  They require a US / Canada card and currently do not accept paypal or any other form of payment.Hopefully they will sort this soon, but if its something that you really want bear this in mind first.

Reviews.Title: Cool. But!
Reviews.Author: Tarek Mansour "Call Me Snake"
Reviews.Content: It's the best camera I ever had. Easy to setup. The picture is amazing. Wide angel is the best..But I do not like to pay 99$ every year for the cloud DVR. I wish if there is a way to have software run on one of my desktops that can handle the DVR functions.You need fast internet for this camera. You also need to be in US to pay for the cloud DVR.OVERALL. I like it and recommend it.

Reviews.Title: From Delivery to Operational in less than 15 minutes
Reviews.Author: M. C. Granade "Txwag91"
Reviews.Content: Love, love, love the easy set and use of this webcam.  You get a 14-day trial for web back up/storage for later playback, but we originally bought this product to keep an eye on our house and the animals when we are away at work.  Works better than advertised.  Did I mention we love it?

Reviews.Title: Dropcam Pro is awesome
Reviews.Author: K. Klinzing
Reviews.Content: When considering a webcam, my husband researched different products. He chosethe Dropcam Pro. We are so very pleased with it.  The ease of setting it up was everythingthey said it was.  I really like the 'talk' feature.  It is so nice to be able check on our house andpets.  I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Just what I had been looking for
Reviews.Author: Howard
Reviews.Content: Great camera! Clear picture, great zoom capability. Ideal for vacation homes w/wifi since it automatically resets and reconnects when internet or power are temporarily down due power outage, etc.  You may need a repeater if it is placed in another room from your wifi router.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Leslie
Reviews.Content: Very easy to set up. Up and running in 5 min. Glad I spent the extra $$ on this camera as opposed to some of the less expensive models I was looking at. I do wish there was an internal storage option besides the cloud subscription Dropcam offers

Reviews.Title: We really became friends in 30 seconds!!!
Reviews.Author: paulo
Reviews.Content: Great image and sound.Very much easy to use.The night vision didn't surprised me, probably because the day vision really does the job.It really requires a good web band.Yes, I'll buy another one or two as soon as possible.

Reviews.Title: Perfect little camera
Reviews.Author: Dan Doron
Reviews.Content: Very easy to set up. Excellent video quality in daylight as well as in darkness.The zoom brings in average quality video

Reviews.Title: Excellent,
Reviews.Author: Nicki Sann Oo
Reviews.Content: Excellent small cam for home security, 100% satisfied for the Wireless Camera and really easy to setup in three minutes.

Reviews.Title: DropCam Pro
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: This is the 2nd generation to the original and comes with high definition viewing. It was easy to setup and the picture quality is great and the view area along with the zoom function are all great features. If your looking for a wireless cam for home security or to just keep tabs on your home or business from time to time. This is the one to get and you will not be disappointed .

Reviews.Title: This New one is great
Reviews.Author: Zig "Zig"
Reviews.Content: The quality of the video is great. I wish it was priced lower, closer to the older version. I do have trouble with the android app on my Note3 using Sprint network... will not play... I have had many discussions with dropcam support, but still does not work...

Reviews.Title: Super amazing
Reviews.Author: William Hodges
Reviews.Content: We watch our two creatures on it when we're away and not sure what havoc they're causing. While our two dogs are pretty boring come to find out, the camera does its job in spades! Highly recommend this, will be getting another soon.

Reviews.Title: Sweet
Reviews.Author: Goldy
Reviews.Content: Great product.. We signed up for the 7-day continuous recording.  .. It's an amazing product... I highly recommend.. Only thing is if you record something and you want to delete it you can't.  You have to call dropcam and they can purge your entire video in the cloud..Just becareful what you say! :-)

Reviews.Title: Exactly as advertised!
Reviews.Author: GKCOLO
Reviews.Content: They said it was easy and it IS!  That doesn't usually seem to be the case but with Dropcam it was.  Simply plug-and-play.... right through to watching "live" and "history" of the video.  The sound is excellent too.  We're taking a trip in the near future and this is a great investment in security.  If you don't have one (or more) get it, you won't be disappointed!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic product
Reviews.Author: Peter Lee
Reviews.Content: I went from several Foscams to the Dropcams. The setup was idiot proof. No more DYNDS. The image quality is superb. Even though I have 7 cameras on my wireless it doesn't get bogged down. I would have given it 5 stars except that they still need to work out the two way communication. The observer can hear sound while observing but the observee cannot make out what the observer is saying.

Reviews.Title: Decent if you are in a temporary living situation
Reviews.Author: Johnny Wang
Reviews.Content: If you rent a place, dorm, or just want to monitor something temporarily, this thing fits your purpose.  I use it to monitor the front of the house through the front window.  I like to know when someone walks by, drives by or if something is delivered.  For that, this fulfills my needs.Since it cannot see through the window at night via infrared, I use the outside porch lights and that works fine.  I am going to be moving to an apartment studio soon and I'll be taking this with me to monitor my place inside when I'm not there.I can see bringing this on a trip and setting it up at a hotel room to watch my room via the wifi when I am not there.  Also to my friends house to watch the kids play outside.The picture is pretty clear but zooming in doesn't really help, even if you enhance it.  I was unable to read my license plate off my car and I was parked fairly close.  The notifications are pretty useful and you can categorize them such as "car", "birds", or "person" so that you know when you should check and ignore the alerts.I've had to reset the router a number of times for connection reasons and the dropcam has always linked back up with no issues once the wifi was restored.  I pretty much haven't touched it or moved it from it's spot in over 2 months since I bought it.If you have a more permanent need, there are 4 camera systems with DVR out there to be had for $400 which are quite good.  I have 7 friends who bought those same systems and it works better for them since they own their homes.I think one is all you need, if you need more cams, then get a 4 cam DVR system instead.

Reviews.Title: Excellent and Easy to use Network Camera
Reviews.Author: Ervin Yeo
Reviews.Content: Excellent and Easy to use Network Camera.I would give it 5 stars if it comes with an option for me to stream it to my own NAS on the LAN.

Reviews.Title: Works great. Just as advertised. Great video and audio.
Reviews.Author: Kevin Zernickow
Reviews.Content: 5 stars for making a product work as advertised. It's worth the extra money for the pro.  I have both.

Reviews.Title: I would say I LOVE IT, but...
Reviews.Author: Gianluca Meardi "jlm"
Reviews.Content: Yes, the camera is perfect, the video quality is superb... but in Italy, where the camera is placed, the product suffers the "intercontinental" network lag.  In fact dropcam guys told me that both CVR and LIVE streams require passing through US based dropcam cloud servers.So... in my Italian case, my live stream drives through Italy - US - Italy to offer an obviously late stream.Hope Dropcam will open facilities in Europe soon.Bottom line: excellent product, but imho needs to solve some network probs for non US customers.

Reviews.Title: Simple to use, but impressive results
Reviews.Author: W. L. Culbertson
Reviews.Content: After reading reviews for several monitoring cameras, I decided to try this one. I have not been sorry. Plug it in, create an account, and there you go. Not only is it simple to use, the resolution is very good. We use it as a security camera at a second residence, and the only drawback I have seen is its hyper-vigilance. It is set up to send an email notification when it detects motion, and on a nice, partly cloudy day, I can get several emails as the sun goes in and out behind the clouds. The sudden change in lighting counts as "motion." If it gets too annoying, I can easily turn it off. In a way it's an amusing little local weather report.

Reviews.Title: nice little camera
Reviews.Author: deb meyer
Reviews.Content: nice features on the cloud service too. It has it's issues but overall very good. Nice little camera for just about anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Love Dropcam
Reviews.Author: Reader "Reader"
Reviews.Content: Great product and so easy to get started. We were online within a minute. Several of my coworkers  are getting dropcams too. We have had it a few months now.

Reviews.Title: Best Wireless Camera!
Reviews.Author: Dynodan
Reviews.Content: Had purchased the Belkin and Imogen camera's previously. This camera is superior to those and is easier to setup. Best way is to setup with PC, then just download smart phone app and log in. Best camera and easiest menu option out of allcameras I have used

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: wright bonte
Reviews.Content: Bought three of these for security purposes.  Super easy to set up.  Great video.  No worries about programming the router or port mapping, etc.  Monitor with iPhone app.  Highly recommend-just plug it in, go to the website to set it up in under 5 minutes, and you're watching your cam.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected.
Reviews.Author: Cathy S. "cas"
Reviews.Content: We purchased two so we could watch pets during vacation.  They exceeded our expectations.  Worked flawlessly.After trying various configurations we finally connected them to a surge protector so you can turn them off easily when you want privacy.  They do get a little warm so I wouldn't put a towel over them.Customer support was fantastic.  One unit went on the blink so we contacted and got a replacement in a few days (just before we left for vacation).

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to be able to monitor some property that we are only at a few weeks a year. It does exactly what I wanted it to do. If I have any issues in setup, or questions Dropcam support has been very prompt in responding. Looking forward for outdoor cameras.Thanks Dropcam

Reviews.Title: These are fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Peter Moshay
Reviews.Content: Believe the hype! The Dropcam pro is much better than i expected it to be. I even signed up for the $99 monitoring/recording option as it all worked so good i knew it was worth the price…… And it was!Highly recommended

Reviews.Title: Had it for a couple of months now...
Reviews.Author: Mike "Mike"
Reviews.Content: and it works pretty well. I purchased it to watch my cat (aimed it at the food bowl ) while I was on vacation and it did the trick.Nice to be able to scroll back and reassure myself he's eating and doing well.I keep it on the second floor of my two story house because it cannot hold connection downstairs. That's my biggest annoyance. Upstairs, where the router is, it does well. BTW, I have high speed cable internet with turbo. If anybody has a suggestion as to how I can extend the range, I'd be happy to read it.For a while I had camera facing inside until my girlfriend told me that was creepy, so now I point it out the window, lol. Better to see who's messing around out front of the house or if any packages have been delivered anyway.I turn off IR at night because the reflection against the window glass messes up the picture, but it's not necessary as there are street lights and the image is quite good even when dark.Haven't figured out how to enhance an image when playing back - I guess you can't. Too bad.After my free cloud subscription ended, I wasn't going to pay for it but that's really the best part so I finally signed up when they had some kind of promotion.Even with the sound off, I watch what I say around it as I'm sure the NSA has ways to tap into it (another reason not to have it viewing inside the house)

Reviews.Title: I own 4, love them. One issue.
Reviews.Author: eric martins
Reviews.Content: The Dropcam pro is a great camera. Best we have used for our kids. We own 4 of these around the house and the biggest issue we have is the wifi on it is kind of weak. I have these running on its own network and channel throughout the house and occasionally it will still lose connection temporarily. I have many other items that are wireless and even farther from the router that connect with no issues and no dropouts. This includes Apple TV and Airplay speakers. I would like to think they are streaming a lot more info than these cameras. This is why I cant give it 5 stars. It would be 3 but it doesnt happen as often now that I went through the extra work of creating a second wireless network with extenders around the house.

Reviews.Title: I'd buy another!
Reviews.Author: Bert M Tenenbaum
Reviews.Content: Great video quality and very easy to set up. This was my second cam and the HD makes a huge difference.

Reviews.Title: Decent picture with lackluster connectivity.
Reviews.Author: J2
Reviews.Content: The picture is decent and two way sound is plus. I like the phone app but there is generally a ~30 sec delay to see what is actually happening on my phone (on my home computer for that matter). The connection speed through the Dropcam server is poor with very sporadic live viewing or playback... the cause is not my home network! I am often waiting as much as watching.Could be five stars with more reliable video service.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I needed!
Reviews.Author: Heather "littleturtle30"
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these cameras after reading the reviews on several of them. I can't believe the quality of the video and the ease of use. I wanted them to see what my dad (who has dementia and lives in an apartment attached to my house) was up to when we weren't in the room. After 2 days, we are addicted to these cameras. His caregivers and my brother (who lives elsewhere) are all glued to our cameras. We take our phones to bed with us, and with the handy motion detector alerts, are able to view exactly what is going on and if we need to get up and deal with a problem. As I said before, the video quality is superb! You even get audio! The baby monitor we had before (just audio) did not even come close to giving us the information that these cameras do. Anyone who has an elderly parent that needs to have tabs kept on them should seriously consider these cameras. This may be one of the best purchases I have ever made.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam Pro
Reviews.Author: Sam McLurkin
Reviews.Content: Got to replace baby camera!! Wish I would have got this a long time ago. Will be purchasing another for play room. Tech support is awesome also. Had a glitch and they responded within 24 hrs on a update that would fix glitch. They where correct!! Highly recommend for new parents or surveillance around the home or work!!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Nathan Allen Stafford
Reviews.Content: I have two Dropcam Pro cameras in my house.  I have setup a sort of security system with them.  They were extremely easy to setup.  The software was really simple.  They connected with no issues to my wifi system.  The range is pretty good but I had issues to connect them on the wifi at far distances even when they should have wifi signal (was in basement so had to go through the floor).  Picture is good quality.  The online system is good to setup alerts.

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality and great customer service!!
Reviews.Author: airsealand
Reviews.Content: I purchased my first Dropcam over a year ago and immediately had to get another. It is incredibly easy to setup and their website is simple an easy to use. Once the Pro came out, I had to have one! The resolution is excellent and FOV is wider. When I find a gadget I like, I purchase (the best one of the year) for my clients as an Xmas gift. Six, Dropcam Pros were given to my top clients this year. Feedback from them so far is that they too, Love It!!!Now, all I need is a weatherproof Dropcam or housing, and I am ready to own another!!!

Reviews.Title: So easy
Reviews.Author: sconway
Reviews.Content: These literally take a few minutes to set up.  I had 1 issue with the cloud recording, but the customer service went well beyond my expectations to fix things quickly.  I now have these in each of our offices, and we're able to monitor after hours activity.

Reviews.Title: Best Wireless Wi-Fi Camera that I have purchased
Reviews.Author: JR
Reviews.Content: Of all the Wireless Wi-Fi cameras that I have purchased and tried the Dropcam Pro Wi-Fi is the best. The picture quality is excellent and it was very easy to setup. I liked having the video and sound in the cloud, that way if someone discovers the camera and turns it off or takes it, the video and sound are still available. One can easily make clips from the cloud and download them for forwarding to the authorities.It would be nice to have a weatherproof version, although it is fairly easy to build your own weather proof housing. The only other downside is that there is no way to adjust the movement trigger alerts. However I did not deduct this from my ratings as the movement alert is still far better than on the other cameras that I have tried.

Reviews.Title: Great Product & Super Easy Set-up
Reviews.Author: Diana E Dominey
Reviews.Content: Great Picture Quality and Super Easy to set-up. I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for an easy to set-up, high quality camera.

Reviews.Title: It really Works Well
Reviews.Author: Anthony G.
Reviews.Content: I bought this cam to monitor our two dogs.  My wife and I travel a bunch for work and this device makes it easy for us to check up on the dogs when were traveling and not at home.Set-up took about five minutes and the picture quality is great.  You just need to have a Wi-Fi system in your house to make it work.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Matthew
Reviews.Content: works as advertised. we use it regularly for our baby and next as a security cam.would recommend it highly.

Reviews.Title: Good Cam But Disconnects A Lot
Reviews.Author: William Martinous
Reviews.Content: I would like the dropcam better if it stayed connected better.  It's good when its working, which is about 80% of the time.

Reviews.Title: Returned it...unfortunately.
Reviews.Author: Steve Vance
Reviews.Content: We (myself and friends) have had a lot of issues with dropouts and the camera going completely offline.Normally, I'd blame the network or ISP. But, in this case, I bumped my upload plan to 2GB to provide extra headroom...no help.  My friends are on different networks and ISPs, obviously and they, too, have issues.The camera itself it incredibly well designed; albeit slightly awkward to fit into tighter places.  The wide angle is really nice, but can interfere with your field of view ESPECIALLY with the IR night vision on.  Anything close to the lens' FOV will really overexpose and cause distraction.I ended up bringing it back to Apple; deciding to wait for more maturity.The worst thing about the DropCam is the pretty heavy subscription charge to have your videos recorded on their CVR servers.  I'd like a way to work around that, and provide streaming locally, but that's not an option.

Reviews.Title: Love our Dropcams!!
Reviews.Author: J. Aguiar
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend Dropcam to anyone looking for a high quality camera solution.  Dropcam runs on Wifi so all you need is a power source.  We've loved them so much that we have several.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: GHASSAN WAHID
Reviews.Content: Great camera, easy setup, pictures is perfect. the only problem I wish I'm able to record on my own computer without the need to pay a high price for iCloud.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product and service!
Reviews.Author: Chris B. "Chris"
Reviews.Content: I have had a couple of similar products and this is hands down the best in terms of image quality, field of view, ease of setup, and the online cloud service is fantastic. I plan on purchasing another camera after the holidays!!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Simeon Ford
Reviews.Content: I was very satisfied with my previous Dropcam and decided to buy the new Dropcam Pro as a second camera.  The HD is definitely clear and the zoom feature is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Sound not as good as Dropcam HD
Reviews.Author: BPL
Reviews.Content: The sound of the Drp[cam Pro is not as loud as the Dropcam HD. Also, the Dropcam Pro wireless connection dropouts are greater than the Dropcam HD. I had to turn off the Dropcam Pro 1080 to SD to get better wireless connectivity. Now I get a lot fewer dropouts with the Dropcam Pro.

Reviews.Title: really good product
Reviews.Author: Joe balkovec
Reviews.Content: Purchased dropcam after looking at other products such as foscam, samsung, etc.  Multiple uses but primarily to be used as security camera.  The setup was easy and it worked well for a few days then i had a few problems with lost video, no motion detection etc.  Had excellent customer support which corrected the problem. (their problem but they fixed it).  Quality of picture is good and it so far it does all of the "stuff" as advertised.  I guess my satisfaction with the product is demonstrated by the fact that i am thinking of getting a second camera.

Reviews.Title: Easy to setup and use
Reviews.Author: Tuimommy
Reviews.Content: We use this as a nanny/nursery cam and it's super easy to set up and use.  The only issue I have is that it sometimes needs to be refreshed on my iPhone or else it gets stuck.  Otherwise, it's awesome and highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: You need quality HD video monitoring, this is the product for you!
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Allum
Reviews.Content: Great product that works, the quality of the product is great. The video quality is as expected for a HD webcam. Finally the best part  the great online storage and depending on what plan you pick your video is saved from 7 to 30 days. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful product!
Reviews.Author: Julia Balfour
Reviews.Content: Simple, easy to use and takes care of all my needs. I now have eyes all over my property, on my wonderful dogs when I am out, and complete peace of mind. Thank you Dropcam!

Reviews.Title: Heats up and slow
Reviews.Author: Dae H. Kim
Reviews.Content: The item picture quality is great. 720p.  two way radio works great.  The bad is... there is a 7-10 sec LAG from the camera to your computer.  I have 30mbs highspeed internet... so that is not the cause.  One other friend who has the product also said the same thing that therer is a huge lag, but its for a dog... so nothing too worry. well, I bought this for a baby and 10sec can mean the world of difference...

Reviews.Title: Nice monitor, but..
Reviews.Author: Biznisnut
Reviews.Content: This is a really nice camera.  Clear pictures.  Great with subscription cloud recording.  Disappointing that you can not record without the cloud.

Reviews.Title: Super Nighttime Video Quality
Reviews.Author: dogperson
Reviews.Content: The quality of the video is so far in advance of their previous version, as to not be believed!  Really great, detailed nighttime images. It's practically like daytime.  The camera is very small and good looking.  A high-quality item for sure.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam
Reviews.Author: Sharon F. Mick
Reviews.Content: It is great piece of mind when you are away and can see that everything is ok at home. It would recommend it to everyone, our son told us about it because he liked his so much

Reviews.Title: Goes great with an AngelCare Baby Sound
Reviews.Author: Eric Schoonover
Reviews.Content: We bought the Dropcam Pro as a companion to our AngelCare baby monitor that does sound only. The AngelCare is highly rated and I didn't want to sacrifice the quality of the baby monitor we were using just to add a second rate video experience.The Dropcam is dead simple to setup and offers very easy monitoring from my iPhone.  It allows us to check on the baby using our computer or phone when we are concerned about how she is doing but don't want to walk into her room and ruin all hope of her going to sleep.As she grows older the Dropcam will probably be transitioned to our front door or over the garage so we can monitor who comes and goes.

Reviews.Title: Worked for a while then stopped. Giving another try. Will update soon!
Reviews.Author: A.J.
Reviews.Content: I'm having tons of trouble with this unit right now. It worked great at first, their customer service has been excellent, hence the 3 star, but I will have to update upon final decision to keep the product or return as defective.

Reviews.Title: Great Cam.  Would Highly Recommend.
Reviews.Author: Sterling Widner
Reviews.Content: I love the dropcam series.  I have a Logitech Alert system at my house as well, but the quality of picture is much better with the Dropcam.  As well as the color.  It is very easy to setup and use.  The phone app works as intended and connecting remote is basically clicking an app.  I plan on purchasing at least one to two more of these cams.  If you would like to have history playback, you will need to purchase a recording plan that records directly to Dropcam's headquarters  (or wherever they send it).  As with watching live feed, accessing the history is as easy as clicking a different tab to swap from live to history.  Dropcam has several public cameras being broadcast daily from other users.  I would recommend taking a look at those cameras if you would like to know the quality.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful camera
Reviews.Author: Francis Joseph
Reviews.Content: Its a wonderful camera and its very easy to install. It has a neat and clear image during the day and also at night. I have three cameras: one in the living room, one in the family room and one in the kitchen. It allows me to know what it's going on at home, especially with the kids, when I am at work. The only aspect I am having difficulty with is that the image and also the recording is frequently interrupted. I thought that it would be more continuous. And sometimes it goes down and there is a written signal saying that the camera is disconnected when it is not. I will call technical support. On the overall however, it is a high quality camera, easy to install, and very easy to manage.

Reviews.Title: High Def for the price of other companies Standard definition systems!
Reviews.Author: Andre Couture
Reviews.Content: So far so good (1st 20 days), I recently added a second Pro cam to my network and they seem to go offline every once in a while (it might be my wireless router though) but for the price and the technology jammed into such a small good looking package it's really impressive. Ipad app works flawlessly and it's very cool to be traveling and check-in on the house anytime and hear sound as well as see stored video. Night vision works like it's daytime, and you can also set it to alert you via email for sound & movement or if the camera goes offline. The 1st one I set up on my laptop took all of 10 minutes, the 2nd camera I did on my Ipad and it was set up in 3 minutes....no joke! If your looking for something you can monitor yourself without the high cost or contracts of other systems..Dropcam is a no brainer.

Reviews.Title: Great quality camera for monitoring!
Reviews.Author: Richard eng
Reviews.Content: This is the best  monitoring camera and it's very easy to set up.  Their extra service for recording through their cloud is a good service for people that need to monitor their house/business.  The quality of the camera is great (HD quality).

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and share
Reviews.Author: Carl Velie
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up and to share with others.  I use it as s surf cam and shared it with others so we can check the surf at any time!  I like that we can zoom in on the picture even though it does pixelate a bit when doing so.

Reviews.Title: Man! This is just too good.
Reviews.Author: William H. Fennelly
Reviews.Content: Man! This is just too good. Why cant they make everything this easy?Wish it could do all same things on my Samsung as it does on the Iphone.

Reviews.Title: A truly great product. Highly recommended !
Reviews.Author: Otis Lift
Reviews.Content: Awesome! It works just as the manufacture claims. You need WiFi and a power source and you are in business!Camera has a wide angle lens that is sure to satisfy. Plus, sound is picked up; you can hear neighbors across the street chatting.Just make sure you own a newer iPad/iPhone for the best experience. Works great on Nexus tablets.

Reviews.Title: What a flawless, easy to use Security camera.
Reviews.Author: Nathan Korosec
Reviews.Content: Purchased this as a gift for my dad's office as he was wanting to see deliveries come to his door, guests, etc. This thing is AWESOME! The setup on it was so easy, plug it in, pull up the app on your iPhone and you'll have it running in under 60 seconds.The mounting hardware included is very nice too. The round pad can have double sided velcro tape put on it and it holds the camera just fine, the weight is of no issue. The camera is even mounted on his office door that leads outside, which means that the camera is swinging on the door every time it is open/closed. The included usb cord is flexible and installing it with wire mold was a dream.The app/website is very nice, the camera has about a 3-4 second delay transmitting over wifi to what is real time. The included 2 weeks of "CVR" (cloud video recording) is a nice touch and allows you to play back any instance where the camera picks up motion. The monthly price is cheap enough for playback after the 2 weeks.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for most but not for me.
Reviews.Author: stevethrewup "Ty"
Reviews.Content: The image quality is definitely among the best netcams out there.  The ease-of-setup is really great and I had it working in about 2 minutes. Mine worked great for a few days and then started to drop connection frequently and would sometimes stay disconnected for hours all the while other WiFi devices worked great from even farther away.  Resets didn't always work and because of this inconsistency, I had to return it.  I may have had a defective unit judging by the positive reviews I've read.I ended up getting a refund instead of an exchange for a few reasons.  The biggest one is the fact that it is constantly uploading video to the cloud; not just during motion or sound. This was slowing my connection speed for other devices and thankfully I don't have a cap on my data.  My other problem is the inability to capture video locally.  I know Dropcam would like to make a buck off their cloud service, which certainly has it's uses, but the average consumer should be given options depending on what they're using the camera for.  If I wanted to use it for a presentation, I wouldn't be able to simply use video capture software and dump the video file into an editor.  I'd have to first go online, edit the clip, download it, then dump into my editor.  Some people won't have any problem with this but I was surprised that the camera can't simply be used as a standard webcam.The local webcam functionality would be great for this camera as it has a very attractive cosmetic design and looks professional for business meetings while providing really fantastic video quality.  If Dropcam decides to give their customers more options,  like full webcam functionality, I'll be back in line to purchase one right away.

Reviews.Title: Great and easy to setup.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Jeremy S."
Reviews.Content: Super easy to setup and works great. I can monitor my home from my phone from anywhere. The only downside to it has been false motion events when the video signal becomes blocky and sets it off so sometimes I get 10-20 motion events a day which just gets annoying.

Reviews.Title: Tardis-Cam
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Kalata
Reviews.Content: I used this to display the Tardis that the Doctor Who Club and I built at Lake Superior State University for the 50th anniversary. The web cam has a wide angle and is very clear. The zoom works better for closeups, then for zooming out though! However, I appreciate the compactness of the camera. It's wireless so I could take it with me to the Comic Club trivia contest. It can fit in a pocket. I like the ability to turn audio off and on, and even speak remotely into the webcam. The iphone app and web interfaces are easy to use. With a 50+ Mbps download speed and upload speed (both) we had some issues with dropped packets though, and they are working on that. It's more expensive than other webcams, but overall I'm pleased with it. I normally don't write reviews, but this one was worth it. I love the ability to record clips and they maintain the files. But I would also like the 'option' of storing them locally. Why should they care if we pay the monthly fee? The cord is pretty long for a USB power cord. I've worked with Logitech and Microsoft and Gigaware webcams. This one is my favorite. I love that I don't have to worry about software going out of date or incompatible with the OS. All you need is a browser. They have areas they can improve but I'm planning to get a second in the spring.

Reviews.Title: A very good surveillance camera.
Reviews.Author: Stephen S. Smith "Dealsmith"
Reviews.Content: The camera is very easy to set up and delivers a very clear image.  My only issue is that the contrast capability is not enough to clearly see the weather outside when the camera is inside looking through a window.  It would be nice if the bright outdoor image were more clear.

Reviews.Title: Great cam! Much better than older model
Reviews.Author: K&S
Reviews.Content: Works great!  Much better than the older Dropcam.  The zoom is great!  The sound is better etc.  Great buy and much better replacement

Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: Lynn kanable
Reviews.Content: picture quality very good, easy to set up, works as advertised. CVR should have more options than one week or yearly

Reviews.Title: Easy set up, good quality.
Reviews.Author: DEguy
Reviews.Content: This unit was very easy to set up. The quality is quite good. Not great, but very good. I can't compare it to any others, but I am very satisfied with this device. Night time image is useable with daytime as I said, pretty good. I have not used the audio portion so I cannot comment on that.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Arnie Parker
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera with exceptional quality ease of use.  I would recommend it to anyone looking for a monitoring camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome unit!  Fast setup, perfect functionality.
Reviews.Author: G. Hale
Reviews.Content: Less than 3 minutes from unpacking to being operational.  We have a commercial grade HD DVR 16 channel unit we use for our home office to cover the entire perimeter and all points of entry, and really like it with web viewing capability.  We got the DropCam Pro for use in hotel rooms.  But once I saw the quality I placed the one unit in our gun room where we have no interior camera.  Now rather than have to get a 2nd DVR unit for mucho bucks I have a quick, dirty and simple solution with the DropCam Pro.  So now it is time to order a 2nd one for use when traveling.Why use one in a hotel room?  We bring firearms, ammo and technical equipment with us when traveling.  A few times too many , despite having a Do Not Disturb sign on the door, we come back to the room and find little things missing.  Battery chargers, cables, battery packs, and other little stuff.  Important stuff goes in the hotel safe, but some items just do not fit.  So with a DropCam we can set up the unit to point in the far corner of the hotel room, then aim the camera at the door.  If someone comes in we will get an email re: movement/sound being sensed, then can grab the video clip from the cloud server in the event someone did enter the room.  This is the simplest, and most functional unit I have found at pretty much any reasonable price point.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam Pro camera is a lifesaver!
Reviews.Author: Donna Trahan
Reviews.Content: This was a little hard to set up at first, but finally got it done.  I use it to keep a watch on my mother in her room.  I can see her whole room at once, so the angle is very wide.  The picture is very clear, both day and night.  Being able to view her from my tablet, smart phone, laptop and desktop is very convenient.

Reviews.Title: WiFi camera
Reviews.Author: Bamboo
Reviews.Content: Camera works very well it has a great picture in HD. Night vision looks pretty good also,  the only thing that  does not work  well is the sound.

Reviews.Title: Great product, superb value !!!
Reviews.Author: Clifford
Reviews.Content: Simple setup, iPhone monitoring, amazing daytime camera with zoom and two-way audio, great infrared night vision, email alerts for motion and camera status. Why bother with traditional approach of multiple cameras, cables, DVRs, and aggravation? This works for me. Got one for vacation cabin... getting another for home. Can't wait until they come out with PTZ and outdoor version !!!

Reviews.Title: Dropcam provides additional security
Reviews.Author: quaite dodson
Reviews.Content: I purchased the first generation of Dropcam to monitor my garage and driveway. I have gates across my driveway but wanted to monitor since my driveway is off an alley. I was very impressed with the first generation. When the Dropcaam Pro came out i wanted to take advantage of the 8x zoom on the pro. I moved the first generation Dropcam to monitor my front door. I now have the front and rear of my house covered with additional security. Dropcam's are easy to set up and they preform quite well. I have been very pleased with my two Dropcam's and have recommended this product to others.

Reviews.Title: Some improvements, but not sold on Pro version
Reviews.Author: P. Horne
Reviews.Content: I've had several Dropcams and have had to exchange them when the night vision dies (happened 3 times).  So I was hoping the Pro version would be a major upgrade.I found the wider view is a major improvement, but the contrast is higher which washes out the detail picked up by my regular Dropcam.  You can see the difference in these two images -- look at the leaves on the left, and the books.  So even though it may be technically a higher resolution, I feel like I'm seeing less detail.DROPCAM: [...]PRO VERSION: [...]The lag time is usually about 5 seconds, but when both cams are running, the Pro version lags even more - about 8-10 seconds.  And even though the Pro version says you can set it up quickly on an iPhone, I was unable to do so -- tried on both an iPhone and iPad, after unplugging and re-plugging the Pro in.  It just couldn't see the cam, so I had to plug it into my computer and do the setup there.I'm not sure if I'll keep the Pro cam -- I'm going to wait a few more days.
