But if you're really on the fence, I don't think it's a $200 value.I will say that the original Dropcam is pretty great, and the software keeps getting better and better.  Using Dropcam on my iPad is amazing - so intuitive and clear.

Reviews.Title: Quality is great, could use just a few more options
Reviews.Author: Brian Stucki
Reviews.Content: I've rated it 5 stars because it's a high quality product, and the relay service is really quite reliable. The image is absolutely large with the new sensor. I can see the whole room, as well as both doors and the side window. It's amazing how far it can spread.My only concern is the constants upstream. We have 5 Dropcams spread around the house and it pushes us close to 400GB of upload per month. My ISP isn't loving that. I'm not sure the alternative though. I suppose it's timing on the recording options. Or maybe a photo every minute and then if motion is sensed, the video capability kicks in.

Reviews.Title: Best that I can find
Reviews.Author: William Whitehead
Reviews.Content: I purchased 5 of the original Dropcams within the last year. I just bought 3 of the Pros.The update to the camera is Fantastic. I think the sensor for switching from daylight to night vision is a little sensitive, and that only applys to the camera facing the street, where its picking up porch, and street lights. I am working on moving the camera a little bit to get the night vision to kick in. I think for the price, Quality, and features you can't beat this camera in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: so far we love these
Reviews.Author: prepare
Reviews.Content: Not a drop in the bucket but these are made well and so far we love them.  Wish the cloud recording wasnt so expensive, they sell it as a home security but if someone breaks into my house the police dont show up unless I happen to be paying attention at that time when I get an alert (which is usual since we have cats) So paying for ADT and this is difficult.  However we love the quality of the cameras and intend on using it when we have a baby as the monitor.

Reviews.Title: The best
Reviews.Author: shahzad m Mir
Reviews.Content: Positive its very and the best camera out there , a must use i loved it .. excellent , very good

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: Strgl
Reviews.Content: Works great!  I had a weak wifi signal in the area of the house it was setup in.  I bought a range extended and now it works great!  Only issues I have:The camera is sitting on a window looking through the glass outside.  When the sun shines through the window it becomes difficult to see.  And at night the night vision reflects in the window also.Otherwise a neat little camera!

Reviews.Title: DropCam Pro
Reviews.Author: Scuba Paws
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!  I have the DropCam also and they are both terrific, but the Pro version has a much sharper picture and the wider view is worth it.I use the cameras to monitor my house inside and outside (the outside camera is monitoring outdoors from the inside, not being put outside. It would freeze in the winter).I have used several internet cameras and I have found these DropCam's to be the best. And they are very reasonably priced. Setup is literally minutes - so easy and reliable.I view my cameras on my iphone5 and ipad - flawlessly.

Reviews.Title: The go to camera for video surveillance!
Reviews.Author: A B C
Reviews.Content: The best camera! Easy to link with WiFi, cloud storage of video for a reasonable price, reliable, create a Dropcam account and see Dropcam cameras in operation for free.

Reviews.Title: OMG...this is FANTASTIC!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Tiffany Wright
Reviews.Content: it was set up in about 3 minutes, and it's freakin' awesome!!!!!!! sooooo stoked to have this. oh, i'm going to be away from my three beloved cats for about 6 weeks, when the longest i've been away from them in the last 12 years has been 13 days. Now i can keep an eye on them and not be quite so sad. Oh, yeah.....i peeked in on the cheetah cubs at the Richmond Zoo this morning, and whaddya know, the bottom right corner of the screen says "dropcam." If it's good enough for them, it should be good enough for most everyone.the night vision is great, and the sound that goes both ways works very well. i couldn't be more pleased with this purchase!!!!

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Ziad Jweiles
Reviews.Content: This is the first time i review a product on Amazon. But this truly deserves my time.It's everything they promised. Easy to install and with a very clear image.Great product!!

Reviews.Title: Super easy to set up.
Reviews.Author: Eva
Reviews.Content: I have had my Dropcam Pro for a few days now.  It was super easy to set up.  The video quality is great and so is the sound. My only negative observation is that I noticed the camera was a little warm after about 20minutes of use.  This doesn't seem to affect the performance.  I love this camera and will be purchasing more!

Reviews.Title: Great home monitoring solution.
Reviews.Author: Nate
Reviews.Content: Great two way audio and the video is crisper and at a wider angle than the Dropcam HD. Great for dropping in on pets!

Reviews.Title: Overall very good and well made product, needs a firmware update and CVR price adjustment for perfection
Reviews.Author: jhelms54
Reviews.Content: Really simple to setup and works with on the iOS app.  Clean and straight forward.  Hardware included is really helpful for walls or to use as a stand.  Also includes a really long power cable for wiring remotely.  It uses a standard USD to micro USB so its easy to order longer or shorter sizes.  One complaint that I have is that it does drop connection at least once a day from Wi-Fi.  Its usually short and reconnects by itself but is annoying.  I am willing to bet they are working on a firmware update.  One wish I had is that their CVR recording service was a flat 9.99 for multiple cameras, currently it is 9.99 for the first camera and 5.00 a month for additional cameras.

Reviews.Title: Dropcams are worth the Price!
Reviews.Author: Guy Drescher
Reviews.Content: I now have three Dropcams in my house. The video is very clear. They were easy to set up and the iPhone and Android apps for real time monitoring are excellent and easy to use. The customer service was shaky with first camera I bought, but that quickly improved to a very customer friendly and fast! I have recommended Dropcam to friends and co-workers. I only wish you could record video to your own PC in addition to the company's cloud.

Reviews.Title: A Great Wi-Fi Video Monitoring Product!
Reviews.Author: David Puglia
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic product - build quality, image quality, angle of view, installation, and software.  I originally bought 2 Y-Cams and could not get them to work with my Linksys a/c router so I returned them (amazon returns are so easy) and purchased 2 drops cams.  The drop cams are of superior build quality for starters.  Higher quality than the Y-Cams.  The installation setup is literally 2 minutes and it works the first time.  I added a second camera that took another minute.  I was viewing both cameras from my MacBook pro in less than 10 minutes total from opening the package from Amazon to unpacking the units and connecting.  Next I loaded the drop cam iPhone app and I was looking at both camera views on my iPhone 5 immediately.  I then got my iPad and the drop cam app was already loaded - part of Apple's iCloud process.  The drop cam iPhone and iPad apps are really well designed.  Nice layout and very intuitive.  I can easily add more cameras as I go. The image quality is HD and is superb.  Also, this camera performs extremely well in very low light conditions as well.  I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: VERY POOR PRODUCT & APPALLING CUSTOMER SERVICE.
Reviews.Author: hopetown99
Reviews.Content: Hi - I am reviewing my dropcam activity and simple activity such as1/ the postman coming to the front door ARE NOT even recording as movement, yet cars going past are. There are rare instances where the postman IS RECORDED, but the sort of activity is recorded as a car type activity.2/ It also in this instance just shows them walking along the foot path and not the short snippet with them coming up to the front door.3/ This isn't working very well for me - can you tell me what I can do - i've scanned through the alerts tool and it just isn't doing what I need it to do. Meanwhile I am going onto the paid cloud service4/ It just isn't recording and alerting me when i need it. In fact, I may have to put a sensor on my front porch to alert me because your tool is so bad.5/ The "sound alerts" pick up a police car in the distance but doesn't recording someone BANGING my front door or pressing the door bell which are far louder than the front door getting banged which is right next to the camera.Overall i'm not pleased. Tell me what you are doing.

Reviews.Title: Easiest connected camera you could ever hope to setup and actually work right.
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: We now have three Dropcams, with the lastest one being a Pro. There is a noticeable improvement in the color and low-light image quality over the standard Dropcam. In the same room, my standard cam will turn on night mode, while the pro is able to still see things naturally with just ambient street lights, moonlight, etc. I was pleasantly surprised to find that running multiple cams with our cable internet seems to have negligible effect on surfing speeds. The wider angle is pretty nice for us, but something to be aware of if you're not looking for that. Mounted in the corner of a room, you'll see both walls on either side of the frame.My one tiny change would be to have the cord exit the rear angled a bit out the back (goes for all Dropcams). The way I have the cameras mounted means the cord pushes against the base.If you're just using the camera to watch traffic, or check that the gate is closed, then the standard model is probably right for you. If you're interested in better details, using it for security (seeing faces), then I'd recommend the pro version.

Reviews.Title: Soooooo easy
Reviews.Author: Michael P.
Reviews.Content: Pull it out of the box, plug it in to your computer, connect it to your wi-fi, and put it in place.  It really does take just 5 mins!As far as the features go, the viewing angle works great for my application, the audio is pretty clear (the camera is in my garage and I can hear when my dog walker calls for my dog), and the night vision is SWEET.  I like the CVR service, too.  Sure, it's $10 per month, but if you can swing that it's totally worth it.  You can watch live from work or check out what happened earlier in the day.  The user interface for their CVR is pretty intuitive and user friendly - it clearly indicates where there was motion, etc.If you are looking for a really easy set up and great user experience while the camera is 'live', you can't go wrong with this dropcam camera.

Reviews.Title: Close to perfect as possible
Reviews.Author: Gerald I. Kimata
Reviews.Content: I had been looking for a simple to use monitoring camera setup, but the models I checked out were for the most part surveillance systems. Also, it became clear they would need some technical expertise to setup properly. Also, maintenance of the recording and remote access features looked like they could require more attention than I was willing to spend. The Dropcam Pro that I got was easy to setup, just as advertised. It never has a problem finding my wireless router and obtaining an IP address, which some of my other wireless components seem to have difficulty doing, so that's a big plus, because I'm often forced to reset the router due to the  many other laps, pads, printers, streamers I've loaded onto my network. The wide angle picture is detailed and takes in my entire living room. At night it turns on its LEDs and you get a night-vision, B&W; picture. I turn the camera on and off remotely with my laptop and iPAD and do my monitoring with just those two devices. Both apps work easily. The sound monitoring is excellent. I can hear the TV clearly over the monitor. However, the talk-back from your remote device over the built-in speaker, which must be tiny, isn't sufficient to compete with the ambient noise in the room if the TV etc. is on. Also, there's a two or three-second delay in the transmit time each way due to, I'm guessing, the net transmission time combined with Dropcam's recording process, which sends the video and audio signals back to its servers for recording. This probably happens whether you decide to subscribe to its recording services or not. So don't expect to conduct two-way voice with much ease. I'm 100% happy with it for my needs, which is to check on a loved one occasionally.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Stan Orchard "Stan Orchard"
Reviews.Content: We've been using this camera at my work where it monitors a colony of naked mole rats. The video and audio are just great. The set-up was a breeze and everything just works as promised. Going back in time and grabbing clips is as easy as the set-up. Very solid hardware and software. Highly recommended. I do wish they would come out with an outdoor version or an optional outdoor enclosure. But other than that, I can't say enough good things about this camera and service.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam Pro, Excellent
Reviews.Author: Jvette "Jvette"
Reviews.Content: I have tried a couple different brands of these wireless cameras and have found Dropcam to be the best of the bunch. I currently have 3 cameras that I just added the Dropcam Pro to. The new Pro camera is wonderful. It is clear and bright and now gives me the option to tilt and pan which is a great help. This provides the clearest picture of all my cams and I am thinking about upgrading the others. You can't go wrong with Dropcam.

Reviews.Title: Phenomenal Product
Reviews.Author: Liz
Reviews.Content: I own both a Dropcam HD and Dropcam Pro. I was already impressed with Dropcam HD as a monitoring service and Pro is a phenomenal product as well. The 130 degree field of view and 8x zoom allow me to monitor my studio apartment when I am away. I notice a huge improvement in the audio and video quality in the Pro. The night vision is spectacular as well. The camera is very affordable and I see it serving a bunch of use cases such as pet and baby monitoring in addition to home security. I would absolutely recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic - HD is Amazing...
Reviews.Author: Wesley Klein
Reviews.Content: The HD video is fantastic.. To be able to zoom in on HD is mind blowing. I own a bakery and we use it to showcase all the wonderful things happening in the store. Very easy to use and setup.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam Pro
Reviews.Author: Wedens
Reviews.Content: You can not error getting this camera. No frustration while setting up in less than two minutes. Fantastic quality and magnification.Upgrades are automatic and they always amaze me what they do.I have two Dropcam's and one Dropcam Pro. One Dropcam I purchased from Dropcam and the other one I purchased from Amazon. The third was a gift.I have no complaints whatsoever and recommend either camera Dropcam or Dropcam Pro although the Dropcam pro has better video quality.If you want to keep tabs on your house this is it. It has motion detection and alerts your iphone ipad and has night vision. Great buy you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam Pro - Perfect if you like Black
Reviews.Author: L. F. Schwartz
Reviews.Content: Love the new Dropcam PRO. I've purchased every version of the Dropcam products since the product launch and this is by far the best camera yet.  My only complaint is that it's only available in Black.  My new pro is installed in our kitchen watching the entrances to the house.  Because the Pro is black and the walls and ceiling are white - the Pro sticks out and the first thing people say when they walk into the house - is that a camera?  Before when it was white/grey no one noticed...Other then that - the Pro rocks and the upgraded Cloud Software is awesome esp the new zoom feature.  Buy it you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: EZ Setup
Reviews.Author: Big Pete
Reviews.Content: The easiest piece of tech I have ever installed.  Very clear picture and sensitivemic. The field of view and enhanced views are super.  Really a quality and inexpensive solution to home monitoring.  Be sure your upload speed is .4Mbps or better.  Mine wasn't and the video would come and go.  Their superb support quickly ID'd the problem.  It was a problem with my dsl router/modem and I was able to increased the upload speed to .5Mbps.  now it runs flawlessly.  To test your upload speed, run speedtest.net.  It will show you your download and upload speeds.Waiting for them to add an outdoor camera!

Reviews.Title: DropCam Pro solved my security problems.
Reviews.Author: Charlie
Reviews.Content: I wanted video that I could monitor away from home and possible save a clip if needed.  The wide angle is great and covers the whole front yard and also a nearby intersection. I have it inside, on a second story window ledge. I am quite happy with it despite having a few lost connection problems.  The support has been great and the problem has been narrowed down to a hardware problem with a replacement camera being shipped 2nd day air.  If that solves the problem I am going to buy a 2nd one.

Reviews.Title: GREAT new camera on the Dropcam PRO!
Reviews.Author: Alybaba "But No 40 Thieves"
Reviews.Content: Being able to be on set in Hollywood and still see my 5 year old daughter sleeping soundly in New York? Priceless! The new camera is GREAT, much clearer picture, and the pinch-and-zoom feature is awesome too! Well done, Dropcam!

Reviews.Title: Does what is says, and does it well!
Reviews.Author: BSG "Music Lover"
Reviews.Content: Was in the market for a camera that monitors only, and found "Dropcam". Easy to set up and use at a very decent price!

Reviews.Title: I love my DropCam
Reviews.Author: Christy N
Reviews.Content: I have been using it for about a week. I use it downstairs to keep an eye on the kids and its wonderful. The audio is amazing, it picks up sound from all around the house. The video is awesome as well. I also use the app to watch from my phone when sitting in living room or going out and about. The kids can't figure out how I am knowing so much that they are doing. For example, I tell them to shut a movie off or their time is up playing video games. They say they are turning it off, so I watch :), usually they don't turn it off when I tell them, so I say "turn it off" They always have this look like how does she know its still on and she's not down here LOL. I love it. I plan to get another one for upstairs so that I don't have to move this one around.

Reviews.Title: New dropcam 1080p resolution
Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: The clarity is amazing at 1080p.  It was easy setup with my iPad app.  I have had some issues where in live mode it stops and has to regain the signal, but that may be due to my internet which is 6mega bits per second.  Maybe a higher speed would eliminate that.  However i also have an older dropcam which is 720p and that doesn't stop in live mode and refain the signal.  The difference in clarity between the two cameras makes the new dropcam a clear choice.

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY NEW DROPCAMS
Reviews.Author: Rosalie Pritchett "Rosalie"
Reviews.Content: I don't just like but LOVE my 2 pro cameras that i got a couple weeks ago.  I was nervous at first about setting it up but called for help from the support people.  They are the most patient, helpful support group I have ever delt with. I had many questions about the cameras later and they were always so helpful and patient with my needs.We always wonder about how our dogs are doing when we are on a trip (aside from my neighbor looking in on them a couple times a day, and that is why we wanted to try this product. I recommend the Pro because it covers the vision of the rooms better . We have them set up in 2 rooms and feel at peace now looking in on them and if anything is wrong..we can call our neighbor to look in on them.  THANK YOU DROPCAM!

Reviews.Title: LOVE my Dropcams!
Reviews.Author: AAdams
Reviews.Content: It all started with one, to check on my ailing dog, then another to check on the side gate, the a third to check on a remodeling of a house… These little cams are fantastic, easy to set up, easy to place, great resolution. Dropcam customer service is amazing , they are easy to reach and answered me in a few mins when I needed them.I love to check on my cams on my iPhone or on a larger computer screen , the image is great either way. If there is one request I'd like to see in future models is that they come in an outdoors case. I have one placed behind a window glass looking outside, and get a reflection of the camera during night time. Otherwise, I couldn't be happier and recommend Dropcam to all my friends.

Reviews.Title: The Best!
Reviews.Author: Shawn C. Potter
Reviews.Content: I've owned Dropcams for years, and the Dropcam Pro is a substantial upgrade from previous models. The picture is crystal clear (truly HD) and the wide-angle lens allows for an expanded viewing area. In addition, the low-light picture is dramatically improved. As with all Dropcams, setup was a breeze.I would recommend the Dropcam Pro to anyone looking for an easy, affordable, quality monitoring solution.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: This device sets up quickly and has such a fast user app, I can't believe it. You can turn it on and off in seconds and be watching your video in a split second. Simply put; it is one of the coolest pieces of technology I have seen or used ever.

Reviews.Title: Pro is the way to go!
Reviews.Author: David (Daddy of Twins)
Reviews.Content: I have no idea why all of these reviews aren't 5 stars. This camera, as well as all of Dropcam's cameras, are amazing! I've got 3 - two regular and one Pro version - and I love love love everything about them. You guys have an amazing item here. The clarity is better especially in night vision mode. I never thought it would be this good. Setup really does take about 1 minute and it is care free after that. Pinch-to-zoom is an awesome feature. Keep up the good work, guys and gals. I'll be wanting a 4th one very soon!

Reviews.Title: Overpromises Underdelivers
Reviews.Author: cmeffie
Reviews.Content: I bought a Dropcam Pro to replace a Foscam that was giving me heartburn. There are big trade-offs, that Dropcam markets as features worth paying 300% premium. Supposedly, the Dropcam's wide angle lens and image enhancement software make panning and tilting unnecessary, but if you want to mask out motion detection by aiming at a relatively narrow area, then you're out of luck (as far as I can tell). The picture quality isn't as good as I expected it would be. It's better than the Foscam, with more detail and more accurate color, but objects/subjects in the frame appear smaller.Setting up the Dropcam wasn't as smooth as advertised. It didn't see our SSID, and didn't see any of the dozens of SSIDs broadcasted throughout our building. After some tinkering, I was able to get it on our network, but I'm not confident that the camera will reconnect by itself. For a "wireless" camera, it sure has a fat ugly USB cable that only serves to setup and supply power. And It would have been nice if they supplied some way of sticking the cable to the wall or ceiling. Another annoying thing about setup was that the installer kept spawning Safari even though Chrome is my default browser and Chrome was already open. Viewing through Safari failed with a "Blocked Plugin" error. I haven't used Safari in years, but I suspect that Apple wants to make it difficult to use Adobe Flash.I'm not sold on the architecture. There's a roughly 5 second lag in the "Live" broadcast from the upload/download round-trip. I prefer the Foscam on-board server (when it works). It'd be great if I could just log into the camera and see the video. It would also be great if I could disable the wi-fi and plug the USB cable into an ethernet adapter, as I trust wired networks.

Reviews.Title: The Best!
Reviews.Author: David Elias Honig
Reviews.Content: I purchased a DropCam Pro when we got a Puppy in December 2013. We LOVE it! It was so easy to hook up to our Wifi network and now we can check in on our Dog when we are out. We get so much peace of mind with DropCam. I also love the cloud service. I decided to get the subscription that saves the past week. Another HUGE plus was when we had a few questions, there customer support answers question very quickly and follows up with you. Its clear as day why Dropcam has been successful. Great Product, Easy to use and great support!We loved Dropcam so much we ordered more just today to put around the house.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Patrick J. Mcnamar
Reviews.Content: This is one great little camera.  Extremely easy to set up and works great on my android device also.  Had a little issue with connectivity at one location but it was not the camera's fault but rather the low upload speed of my internet provider.  Tech support from the company was incredible, they monitored the camera many times to see what it was doing.  They were determined to make me happy.  Purchased a second one for a different location on a different internet provided and it works awesome, never skips a beat.  Wish they had an outdoor model!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: J. Leon
Reviews.Content: So much so, that I have 4 of them. Beware, they are network hungry! I had to get a second router and have them use that instead of the main router. The second router allows me to put a cap on connections, therefore all my home network traffic is not adversely affected. I dont know if this is because I have 4 of them or not, but this setup works for me. If interested, my second router is a higher end Buffalo router - took 15 mins of setting up and all networked devices are now happy. Dropcam allowed me to catch on camera someone stealing the GPS from my car and I showed the police the video - so, it brings peace of mind knowing when and how something happened. My only wish is to have an outdoor casing - mine are up against the windows pointing out. Some glare when the lights are on, but that's OK so far.

Reviews.Title: Local Storage
Reviews.Author: Lewis Stone
Reviews.Content: I wish there was a way that i could store video on my own computer instead of paying for a service which i don't want to do.

Reviews.Title: Review of Drop cam Pro
Reviews.Author: andyt
Reviews.Content: Installing is a snap. Working as expected. We can turn camera on and off via internet. Still do not know how to change password. There is no information of how to do so. Google came back with none. Else rating would be 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Best internet cam experience I have had.
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Kallman
Reviews.Content: Super easy setup and the software seems robust on a number of platforms. Completely opposite the last couple internet cams I have purchased. Also like the DVR function and the notifications. Just wish they had an outdoor model...

Reviews.Title: Audio bad.
Reviews.Author: PAUL ROMAN
Reviews.Content: Audio doesn't work.  This was one of the reasons I bought cam.  When it does very weak sound.Otherwise cam very easy and clear.

Reviews.Title: Quality
Reviews.Author: Yevangelist
Reviews.Content: Happy that I bought this item, it's better than me having it professionally installed and having to pay that huge payment. I was able to set this up in under 5 mins (I'm a computer novice)

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Mark D. Peterson "MDP"
Reviews.Content: The new version of this is even better than the first, the HD is better, the picture is clearer and better quality, the lens is wider and there is a zoom, the zoom is ok, goes a bit blurry so if the zoom is an important feature it is not going to give you a super clear zoom image, it does zoom but goes out of focus. Zoom is not super important for me, would be nice if it stayed in focus but not a deal breaker for me, love this camera.

Reviews.Title: Must Consider! Other solutions have inferior quality/reliability.
Reviews.Author: Larry J Gatewood
Reviews.Content: Dropcam Pro is an excellent solution for in-home surveillance, security, and fun! The image quality and viewing angle are excellent. It allows two-way voice "getting someone's attention" in the room. The camera is easy to setup and use. It is accessible via computer (browser), tablet, or phone. It can use port 80 for access from behind corporate firewalls. And if you need support they are very responsive and helpful.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: Eugene Giddens
Reviews.Content: So far, Great works as advertised. I  been pleased with performance and operation. The color is good, the night vision works.

Reviews.Title: Spectacular Produce
Reviews.Author: Robert Davies
Reviews.Content: Have tried many other video monitoring cameras which were terrible.  The Dripcam Pro is way above everything else I tried.  Best video, sound pickup, quality image, constant recording of activity and very easy to set up and use.  Great job, Dropcam!

Reviews.Title: great camera best value
Reviews.Author: Howard T Lipinsky
Reviews.Content: Ease of setup, ease of use, high quality video and sound. Great features such as notifications and ability to review past events

Reviews.Title: It a grate camera I will be getting two moor
Reviews.Author: james f wall
Reviews.Content: It dos what I wanted it to do for me at a price it could afford I will be getting two moor

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: J. Knechtel
Reviews.Content: Love this camera. Great picture quality. Love to look and see what my fur babies are doing while I am at work

Reviews.Title: Pretty Cool!
Reviews.Author: Augustus Antalek
Reviews.Content: Easy setup, great pictures and features.  Customer support excellent with any issues you may have.  Wishing for an outdoor version! Best camera out there.

Reviews.Title: Drop Cam Pro is awesome!
Reviews.Author: Betsy Gillian
Reviews.Content: Love my drop cam but when I saw the drop cam pro had come out I just had to try it.  It was everything you advertised and more.  Love it too!!  Five gold stars should go to your support staff also.  They are always top notch!

Reviews.Title: Dropcam Pro 2013
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: Very Happy with the quality and wide angle.  A little slower to access on the internet than the HD verison.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied with the wide angle coverage
Reviews.Author: Jon R Tejano
Reviews.Content: I like the wide angle coverage. It sees the entire front of my house, so I don't need a second camera in front. It is also very clear. Sometimes it gets disconnected. I'm assuming this is due to the wi fi. The only thing I don't like is that it cannot differentiate between a car and a person. It would be nice if it can be programmed to differentiate between cars, people, or animals (dogs, cats, squirrels). Overall though, I am very satisfied with it. I would certainly recommend this product to my friends and relatives.

Reviews.Title: Need one thing
Reviews.Author: Majid ALOtaibi
Reviews.Content: I noticed that featured cameras has a "follow" button. This product would be "perfect" if all public cameras has a "follow" service.
